@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper class to work with VML . If this class is used, it initialized VML support. Note: This class is only available in Internet Explorer!

@param.name: @param
@param.body: attributes {Map?null} An optional map of element attributes
@param.description: An optional map of element attributes

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
win {var?null} The browser window element, in which the element
     should be created.
@param.description:
The browser window element, in which the element
     should be created.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates an VML image and configures it. The image is always tiled.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: source {String?} The URL of the image to display
@param.description: The URL of the image to display

@param.name: @param
@param.body: width {Integer?} The desired width of the image element
@param.description: The desired width of the image element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: height {Integer?} The desired height of the image element
@param.description: The desired height of the image element

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
xOffset {Integer?0} The horizontal offset of the image inside of
     the image element.
@param.description:
The horizontal offset of the image inside of
     the image element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
yOffset {Integer?0} The vertical offset of the image inside of
     the image element.
@param.description:
The vertical offset of the image inside of
     the image element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
imageWidth {Integer?null} The full width of the image. This value
     is required, when an xOffset is given.
@param.description:
The full width of the image. This value
     is required, when an xOffset is given.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
imageHeight {Integer?null} The full height of the image. This value
     is required, when an yOffset is given.
@param.description:
The full height of the image. This value
     is required, when an yOffset is given.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Element} the VML element of the image
@return.description: the VML element of the image

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the image source and configures the image. The image element size resized to the given size and the image is always tiled.

@signature.name: @signature
@signature.body: function(image, source, width, height, xOffset, yOffset, imageWidth, imageHeight)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: image {Element} The image VML element created by {@link #createImage}.
@param.description: The image VML element created by {@link #createImage}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: source {String} The URL of the image to display
@param.description: The URL of the image to display

@param.name: @param
@param.body: width {Integer} The desired width of the image element
@param.description: The desired width of the image element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: height {Integer} The desired height of the image element
@param.description: The desired height of the image element

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
xOffset {Integer?0} The horizontal offset of the image inside of
     the image element.
@param.description:
The horizontal offset of the image inside of
     the image element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
yOffset {Integer?0} The vertical offset of the image inside of
     the image element.
@param.description:
The vertical offset of the image inside of
     the image element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
imageWidth {Integer?null} The full width of the image. This value
     is required, when an xOffset is given.
@param.description:
The full width of the image. This value
     is required, when an xOffset is given.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
imageHeight {Integer?null} The full height of the image. This value
     is required, when an yOffset is given.
@param.description:
The full height of the image. This value
     is required, when an yOffset is given.
